attributes.action: Sack the Health Secretary Matt Hancock due to his response to Covid 19.
attributes.additional_details: This needs to happen to allow a fresh pair of hands to get us out of the endless dystopia that the response to the Covid 19 Virus has brought on our society.
attributes.background:
Matt Hancock is displaying a lack of understanding of the science (especially on false positive tests), presides over several fiascos including PPE, care home infections and deaths and track and trace. In normal times he would have been sacked.

His time is up and he has to go.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions which call for someone to be given a job, or to lose the one they have, as petitions cannot override someone's right to due process.

You may wish to sign this petition instead: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/331877
